materials.raw_text:
Ce: 16.5 g (Cerium oxide, CeO2) 
 S: 8.0 g (Sulfur powder, S) 
 Tb: 12.0 g (Terbium oxide, Tb4O7)

sourcing.instructions:
Cerium oxide can be sourced from chemical supply companies like Sigma-Aldrich or Alfa Aesar. 
 Sulfur powder is available from local chemical suppliers or online marketplaces like Amazon. 
 Terbium oxide can be found at specialized rare earth material suppliers or online specialty chemical vendors.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solidified material from the crucible.
